title: Scanning files even though i already download patch 5.5 a few days ago
body:
so  this problem has happened once in the past a few patches ago where basically what happened is i'd install the patch and everything would be fine but maybe a week later i'd open LoL but it just scans files and says 33% (currently at 900and counting) even though i've already been playing with the new patch. last time i read somewhere to reinstall the whole thing but that took hours and i really don't want to do that again please is there any alternative to fixing this? 

UPDATE: its okay now i just had to wait for about 10 minutes for it to stop

replies.body: This same issue is happening to me. I'd played on patch 5.5 but then I opened the patch a few days ago and it began patching again. When it reached 99% an error came up that read, "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." I didn't have a fix to this problem, but the next day when I opened the Patcher it just continuously scanned files. Now whenever I open the client it begins patching until around 85% and then the client freezes and crashes. I've tried a few things to fix but nothing as worked so far after 3 days of being unable to get past the Patching screen.

Sometimes hot-fixes are released while a patch is out, some of them requiring your entire game files to be read. If your patcher is 'scanning' files, and no error message appears, just hold it out; it'll work eventually.
